author: brianoO5798MK
title: Ritz Carlton -- no longer a luxury icon?
text: A hotel chain whose name is synonymous with luxury, is filled with 1980's decor, and over priced upgrades. Thank you for the insulting sign in the bathroom, reminding me that you'll charge $120.00 fee for removing the bathrobe. What do you think I'm a piece of trash that steals things? I think you profited more than 120 when you charge me 150 a night to get access to your club lounge.
